meanings.definition: A substance that produces suds or lather when mixed with water.
meanings.sent1: I added the sudser to the sink and watched the bubbles form.
meanings.sent2: The sudser made the bath water all bubbly and fun.
meanings.sent3: The sudser decided to throw a sudsy party in the washing machine.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sudser, bubbling up uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The sudser foam looked like a fluffy cloud in the sink.

meanings.definition: A dramatic or emotional television show or movie.
meanings.sent1: The new sudser on TV has everyone talking about the plot twists.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys watching sudser shows that keep her on the edge of her seat.
meanings.sent3: The sudser actors rehearsed their lines with great passion.
meanings.sent4: His life felt like a sudser, full of unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The sudser movie left a lasting impact on the audience with its emotional scenes.
